Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In a real-world Order-to-Cash process, a credit check is a critical step that ensures the customer is financially reliable. Skipping this check could lead to risks such as non-payment, bad debts, or regulatory non-compliance.

Text: In typical real-world processes, steps like Check_Credit or issuing an invoice should happen exactly once per order. Such anomalies as skipping or looping through key steps deviate from established norms in well-functioning workflows.
